flawed_nl_solution:
Lisa had 20 - 5 = <<20-5=51>>51 marbles.
Since Cindy gave 12 marbles, then she only has 20 - 12 = <<20-12=8>>8 marbles left.
Since Lisa received 12 marbles, then Lisa has 51 + 12 = 63 marbles now.
Hence, Lisa has 63 - 8 = <<63-8=55>>55 marbles more than Cindy.
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
